# File ../lib/sqlpostgres/PgTwoPoints.rb, line 20
    def initialize(*args)
      case args.size
      when 0
        @p1 = PgPoint.new
        @p2 = PgPoint.new
      when 2
        @p1 = args[0]
        @p2 = args[1]
      when 4
        @p1 = PgPoint.new(*args[0..1])
        @p2 = PgPoint.new(*args[2..3])
      end
    end
